description: React component for displaying detailed information about a course in the admin dashboard, including fetching course data and enrollment count, and rendering course details, tags, instructor info, and timestamps.

classes.name: CourseDetail
classes.description: TypeScript interface defining the structure of course detail data, including optional instructor info.

methods.name: AdminCourseDetailPage
methods.description: Main React component for displaying course details, managing state, fetching data, and rendering UI.
